TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Death will not be cheated this time, Enemy units have -100% withdrawl chance.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Death will not be cheated this time, Enemy units have -100% withdrawl chance.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Death will not be cheated this time, Enemy units have -100% withdrawl chance.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Death will not be cheated this time, Enemy units have -100% withdrawl chance.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Death will not be cheated this time, Enemy units have -100% withdrawl chance.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Gives all living units +1 death damage and 30% damage to undead
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Gives all living units +1 death damage and 30% damage to undead
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Gives all living units +1 death damage and 30% damage to undead
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Gives all living units +1 death damage and 30% damage to undead
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Gives all living units +1 death damage and 30% damage to undead

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Protects Units from all forms of Death Damage
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]Protects Units from all forms of Death Damage
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]Protects Units from all forms of Death Damage
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]Protects Units from all forms of Death Damage
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]Protects Units from all forms of Death Damage

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]All practitioners of Undeath have their souls overwhelmed by Arawn's sorrow for several turns, leaving them unable to raise the dead
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]All practitioners of Undeath have their souls overwhelmed by Arawn's sorrow for several turns, leaving them unable to raise the dead
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]All practitioners of Undeath have their souls overwhelmed by Arawn's sorrow for several turns, leaving them unable to raise the dead
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]All practitioners of Undeath have their souls overwhelmed by Arawn's sorrow for several turns, leaving them unable to raise the dead
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]All practitioners of Undeath have their souls overwhelmed by Arawn's sorrow for several turns, leaving them unable to raise the dead

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]This Archmage makes a pact with one of Laroth's Dullahan, giving their body over to be possessed.
TEXT.French: [ICON_BULLET]This Archmage makes a pact with one of Laroth's Dullahan, giving their body over to be possessed.
TEXT.German: [ICON_BULLET]This Archmage makes a pact with one of Laroth's Dullahan, giving their body over to be possessed.
TEXT.Italian: [ICON_BULLET]This Archmage makes a pact with one of Laroth's Dullahan, giving their body over to be possessed.
TEXT.Spanish: [ICON_BULLET]This Archmage makes a pact with one of Laroth's Dullahan, giving their body over to be possessed.
